DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate efficacy UpholdTM LITE mesh 12 month follow period , use composite outcome include good anatomical correction anterior apical compartment ( stage 0 1 ) , prolapse ( bulge ) symptom ( answer `` '' question 3 PFDI-20 ) reintervention recurrent prolapse anterior apical compartment .
DOC.brief_title: Uphold Mesh Surgical Treatment Uterine-predominant Prolapse
DOC.detailed_description: Secondary objective include evaluation following : - Change baseline POP-Q score 6 week , 6 month 12 month post procedure , include evolution treat non-treated posterior compartment . - The proportion patient anatomical prolapse ( C/D ) , asymptomatic . - Change baseline mean quality-of-life score . - Evaluation mesh property procedure date study period . - Peri-operative post-treatment pain score assessment compare various anesthesia regime use ( Visual Analog Scale ) . - Assessment patient subjective outcome overall treatment effect satisfaction . - Objective evaluation mesh shrinkage standardize ultrasound measurement .
